original_text: While the boy was coming, the bad spirit threw him to the ground. It threw the boy first one way and then the other. ‘Stop!’ Jesus said to it. He then made the boy well and he gave him back to his father.
korean_text: 올 때에 귀신이 그를 거꾸러뜨리고 심한 경련을 일으키게 하는지라 예수께서 더러운 귀신을 꾸짖으시고 아이를 낫게 하사 그 아버지에게 도로 주시니

sentences.original_text: the bad spirit threw him to the ground.
It threw the boy first one way
sentences.korean_translation: 그 영은 소년을 먼저 한쪽으로 던지고

sentences.original_text: He then made the boy well
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 나서 예수님은 소년을 낫게 하시고

sentences.original_text: and he gave him back to his father.
